item.description:
What does the REAL Christmas Story have to do with Advanced Energy Healing?

The same group who preserved the COMPLETE records of Jesus' birth, also saved all the info about the REAL purpose he came. He was MUCH MORE that a singular spiritual being as is currently believed.

He was called "Jeshua 12" and his mission included bringing self-help energy healing techniques to humanity, as necessary to spiritually survive severely disruptive energetic changes known for eons to arrive here Dec 21, 2012.

Since all other records have since been twisted and perverted, we can now understand why the original records were hidden and cloistered so they could be brought back now!

At this Meetup, a recording will be played telling the soulful story of Jeshua's arrival.

These records were preserved by the Melchizedek Cloister Emerald Order (MCEO), described on this link:

http://www.azuritepre...

As it turns out, the group who preserved these records also preserved WAY more information, which is vital for us to know at this time.

To view a description of "The Real Christmas Story" which will be played and discussed this time, click on the link below:

http://www.azuritepre...



This Meetup adjourns at 9:00 PM. Please bring your own refreshments.

DIRECTIONS: Get on I-93 from wherever you are. We are approx. half an hour north of Concord, NH.

Get off on exit 22. At the end of the ramp go North on Rt. 127 (toward Gaza). In approx. 1.5 miles you will come to a stop sign.

Turn left, going North on Rt 132. Watch for mailbox number 298 on the right side of the road, approx. 1.5 mi. up. A tan building with semi-circular window is across the street, on the left side.

Go up the first driveway into the property, which has a Meetup sign at the end. Do NOT go up the second driveway which has a sign "ULCS Clinic". No parking is allowed there, so if you get that far, turn around in that driveway and go back and up the first driveway.

Enter through the front door, where you will see another Meetup sign. No need to knock. Just go on in and down the stairs and have a seat in the classroom. If you are arriving early for a private appointment, have a seat in the waiting room instead.

..

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: The REAL Christmas Story (from Cloistered Records)
